subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Duke won 78-57 against a West Virginia team that never seemed able to get its momentum going. They will face Butler in the N.C.A.A. final on Monday night.
snippet: Duke won 78-57 against a West Virginia team that never seemed able to get its momentum going. They will face Butler in the N.C.A.A. final on Monday night.
